special_features: Commentary by Lalla Ward, David Gooderson, and director Ken Grieve
Terror Nation - A documentary about writer Terry Nation
Directing Who - Ken Grieve recalls his time on this story
Easter Egg: VT countdown for all four episodes

notes: First serial of season 17 of Doctor Who.
Featured the twelfth appearance of the Daleks and the second of Davros, portrayed by David Gooderson for the only time.
Final televised story written by Terry Nation.
First story produced under script editor Douglas Adams.
Episode one featured K9 being voiced by Dalek voice actor Roy Skelton due to K9's laryngitis.

in_universe_mythology: Skaro, the home planet of the Daleks
real_world_cultural_references: Douglas Adams' The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

continuity_notes: Davros was thought exterminated in Genesis of the Daleks.
The Doctor recognizes Romana's resemblance to Princess Astra.

plot.plot_summary: The Doctor and a newly regenerated Romana arrive on Skaro to find the Daleks mining the planet in search of their creator, Davros. They're at stalemate in an interplanetary war with the Movellans. Davros is revived and aims to give the Daleks a strategic edge. The Movellans want the Doctor to do the same for them. Using clever tactics, the Doctor incapacitates both enemies, freezing Davros to be later tried for his crimes, while Romana and the Doctor escape.
